name: PLORD_Prometheus_GrenadeLauncher
title: Prometheus Grenade Launcher
author: Demer Nkardaz
description:
Grenade launcher with various ammunition types and available as hand weapon, turret, spidertron, tank and armor equipment.
Some of all ammunition: Frag, Armor-piercing, Cluster, Acidic, Plasma, Thermobaric, Incendiary, High-Explosive, Plutonium etc.
